subject: RE: [junit] Exception: java.lang.LinkageError
msgSnippet: Search the archives for LinkageError . You ll find your answer. ... From: nsparis [mailto:nathan.paris@laurelhillgis.com] Sent: Thursday, March 28, 2002 1:16
messageBody:
Search the archives for "LinkageError". You'll find your answer.

-----Original Message-----
From: nsparis [mailto:nathan.paris@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 28, 2002 1:16 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Exception: java.lang.LinkageError


I am trying to test a class that reads and writes XML. The class has
an internal class which implements org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler. When I
run the the test I get the following exception:

java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraints violated when linking
org/xml/sax/ErrorHandler class

Any ideas? I can run the class from a main() and it wirks fine..only
gets the exception from inside JUnit.

Thanks
